profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on Linux engineering, CI/CD, automation, and system administration tasks (Macro-Category A). There are no mentions of AI/ML models, generative AI, prompt engineering, or traditional ML tasks (Macro-Category B). The role involves building and professionalizing the Linux environment, managing infrastructure, and contributing to software testing and design, all of which fall under core software engineering principles. Therefore, the profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities and technologies involved. It clearly describes a traditional Linux/DevOps engineering role without any AI/ML components, making the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
